Name: Will Of Alan
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients without ice. Add ice, SHAKE again and strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Discovered in 2008 at Tonic, Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Will Of Alan contains 234 calories
